result.execSummary:
The defendant Adam Ray Gibson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Adam Ray Gibson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Adam Ray Gibson was found guilty of Possession of Methamphetamine, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
- 2 days credit against ultimate sentence

In the event that the defendant is revoked or discharged from either probation or extended supervision with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victim(s) and/or governmental entities for any balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.
Concurrent with: 22CM259 Count 1 and 22CF461 Count 2 without prejudice to consecutive sentencing in the event of Probation Revocation

miscConds.notes:
- $268.00 Court Costs, Payable through DOC as a condition of Probation in 22CF346 Count 2. 
- $250.00 DNA Surcharge, Payable through DOC as a condition of Probation in 22CF346 Count 2.

- DNA Sample
- Absolute Sobriety
- Test randomly and regularly
- Successfully complete Matrix program
- Not to associate with any persons known or suspected to be involved in use, trafficking, dealing or manufacturing of illegal drugs except in a treatment setting
- No Contact with B. Peterson, M. Bjurstrom, K. Shepherd and residence or Amery Auto Salvage
- Participate in Restorative Justice program
- Not to use or possess firearms or electric weapons 
- Pay supervision fees

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Adam Ray Gibson

records.addlTxt: e: DA, Atty Satorius, and DOC   c: DE and SCSO. arc

9:25 AM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Adam Ray Gibson in court, in custody.  Attorney Travis Satorius with Stephanie Schmidt in court for Adam Ray Gibson.  Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Includes 22CF346, 22CF461, & 22CM259.  ADA Becker recites joint agreement. Court questions ADA Becker on the repeaters on each charge.  ADA Becker states these would be charged without repeater.  Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads G to Ct 2- Possession of Methamphetamine without repeater in 22CF346, G to Ct 2- Bail Jumping without repeater in 22CF461, & G to Ct 1- Theft- Movable Property without repeater in 22CM259. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 2 in 22CF346, Ct 2 in 22CF461 & Ct 1 in 22CM259.  On motion of the State without objection, Crt dismisses Ct 1, 3, & 4 in 22CF346, Ct 1 & 3 in 22CF461, & Ct 2 in 22CM259.  Sentencing arguments. 

Court Orders: Ct 2 in 22CF346
2 days credit against ultimate sentence

S/W 3 Years Probation is concurrent on all counts without prejudice to consecutive sentencing in the event of Probation revocation. 

- Court Costs: $268.00     
- DNA Sample and Surcharge: $250.00
Balance to be pd through probation

Court Orders: Ct 2 in 22CF461
72 days credit against ultimate sentence

S/W 3 Years Probation is concurrent on all counts without prejudice to consecutive sentencing in the event of Probation revocation. 

- Court Costs: $268.00     
- DNA Sample and Surcharge: $250.00
Balance to be pd through probation

Conditions of Probation:

- Absolute sobriety
- Test randomly and regularly
- Successfully complete Matrix program
- Not to associate with any persons known or suspected to be involved in use, trafficking, dealing or manufacturing of illegal drugs except in a treatment setting.
- No Contact with B. Peterson, M. Bjurstrom, K. Shepherd and address, NC with Amery Auto Salvage
- Restitution $170, $80 to B. P and $90 to Auto
- Restorative Justice
- Not to use or possess firearms or electric weapons. 
- Pay supervision fees

Court Orders: Ct 1 in 22CM259

I/S 7 Months Jail

1 year Probation concurrent to Ct 2 in 22CF346 and Ct 2 in 22CF461
2 days credit against ultimate sentence

- Court Costs: $243.00     
- DNA Sample and Surcharge: $200.00
Balance to be pd through probation

State has until Friday, 9/23/22 to correct credit outlined by Atty Satorius, if no correction needed Clerk has authorization to complete JOC with days of credit noted by Atty Satorius.  

Adjourned at 10:11 AM.

9:20 AM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Adam Ray Gibson in court, in custody.  Attorney Travis Satorius in court for Adam Ray Gibson.  Prosecuting attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for the State of Wisconsin. Includes 22CF346, 22CF461 & 22CM259. Court reviews file. Atty Satorius believes there will be a resolution, DE is on hold until 10/8/22 asking to set PLEAS before that time. Adjourned at 9:22 AM. bph
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.

1:17 PM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Adam Ray Gibson in court, in custody.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Adam Ray Gibson. Includes 22CF346 (ARGN), 22CF461 (ARGN), & 22CM259 (STC).  As to 22CF346- Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG on all 4 counts.  On 22CF461- Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG on all 3 counts.  ADA Becker states discovery has been sent to defense.  Atty Dolfi states no speedy trial demand at this time. Defense has 20 days  to file any motions.  Bond continues at this time.  Court notes previously scheduled hearings.  Adjourned at 1:28 PM. bph

3:16 PM Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Unmonitored DAR, Clk: Yates. Prosecuting attorney Michael Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Travis Satorius in court for Adam Ray Gibson. Defendant Adam Ray Gibson in court, in custody. Includes 22CF461 (PTC), 22CM259 (PH), 22CF346 (PTC).Atty Satorius waives Preliminary Hearing, requests arraignment and status conf. Court advises of rights and possible penalties regarding a preliminary hearing.  Court finds DF has freely, voluntarily, and knowingly waived the right to a preliminary hearing, finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial. Attorneys agree all cases to be scheduled at once with SRN.Court advises counsel to schedule with SRN JA. Adjourned: 3:19 p.m.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Adam Ray Gibson
Current: 402 Jewell St, Star Prairie, WI 54026 United States  (Effective: 07-12-2022)
Prior: 402 Jewell Street, Apt. B, Star Prairie, WI 54026

- INCLUDES 22CF346 & 22CM259

- No possession of firearms

- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant. 

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Peterson Family.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

9:57 AM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Stephanie Kay Schmidt in court for Adam Ray Gibson. Defendant Adam Ray Gibson in court. Includes 22CF346 (INIT) & 22CM259 (PTC).  On 22CF346- Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading. Waive speedy prelim.  Atty Schmidt will not represent DE on new file, only 22CM259.  DE verified address and updates phone number.  Bond continues. Adjourned at 10:10 AM.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on September 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.
